content.raw:
Thank you Nate, it’s working really well!! I no longer see the error message and from what I can see, subscriptions work as they should.

I even subscribed to the clock, and while it returns _a lot_ of messages, the server doesn’t crash.

This PR is pointing to your `websockets` branch. Do you want to merge it, or just merge your commit [f0c7cf1](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-launch/commits/f0c7cf1)?
content.html:
Thank you Nate, it’s working really well!! I no longer see the error message and from what I can see, subscriptions work as they should.

I even subscribed to the clock, and while it returns a lot of messages, the server doesn’t crash.

This PR is pointing to your websockets branch. Do you want to merge it, or just merge your commit f0c7cf1?
